participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Determined and imaginative, with a hint of nostalgia for her artistic past.
participant_1.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and social, with a passion for music and teaching young minds.
participant_2.background: i'm getting married in the spring. i love eating out with friends. my favorite singer is taylor swift. i'm 24 years old. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher.

content.text: i'm 24 years old and love taylor swift
